Perfecto para fotos de perfil de redes sociales, publicaciones de Instagram, miniaturas y m√°s. Elige entre fondos borrosos, colores s√≥lidos, cambio de tama√±o u opciones de recorte.

tool.square.faq.a2: ¬°S√≠! Usa los modos "Cuadrado con desenfoque" o "Cuadrado con color" para hacer tu imagen cuadrada sin perder ninguna parte de la foto original. Estos modos a√±aden un fondo borroso o coloreado para llenar el espacio cuadrado, manteniendo tu imagen completa intacta y centrada.

faq.a1: MeCollage es un creador de collages de im√°genes en l√≠nea gratuito que te permite crear hermosos collages con im√°genes ilimitadas. Ofrece opciones de dise√±o profesionales, funciones de personalizaci√≥n y soporte para hasta 20 fotos por collage.

about.title: Sobre Nosotros
about.subtitle: Conoce la misi√≥n, los valores y la historia de MeCollage
about.welcome_p1: MeCollage es un creador de collages de im√°genes en l√≠nea gratuito dise√±ado para ayudarte a crear hermosos collages de fotos de forma r√°pida y sencilla. Nuestra misi√≥n es proporcionar una herramienta simple, potente y centrada en la privacidad que cualquiera pueda usar para transformar sus fotos en impresionantes historias visuales.
about.welcome_p2: Ya sea que est√©s preservando recuerdos familiares, creando contenido para redes sociales o dise√±ando una cartera, MeCollage te brinda las herramientas para crear collages de aspecto profesional sin la complejidad del software costoso.
about.story_p1: MeCollage naci√≥ de una idea simple: hacer hermosos collages de fotos deber√≠a ser f√°cil y gratuito para todos. Notamos que muchas herramientas existentes eran demasiado complejas, estaban llenas de anuncios o requer√≠an suscripciones costosas para funciones b√°sicas.
about.story_p2: Nos propusimos construir una mejor soluci√≥n: una herramienta que se ejecuta completamente en tu navegador, respeta tu privacidad (tus fotos nunca salen de tu dispositivo) y ofrece funciones de nivel profesional sin una curva de aprendizaje pronunciada.
about.story_p3: Today, MeCollage continues to evolve based on user feedback, with a focus on simplicity, performance, and privacy. We're committed to keeping our tool free and accessible to everyone.
about.offer_20_photos_desc: Create collages with up to 20 photos, perfect for showcasing multiple memories.
about.offer_ratios_desc: Choose from 1:1, 4:5, 9:16, 3:4, and 16:9 ratios for any platform.
about.offer_design_desc: Adjust spacing, rounded corners, and other design elements.
about.offer_filters_desc: Enhance your photos with various filters and effects.
about.offer_text_stickers_desc: Add text and fun stickers to personalize your collages.
about.offer_privacy_desc: All processing happens locally in your browser - no data sent to servers.
about.value_privacy_desc: Creemos que tus fotos te pertenecen. Es por eso que MeCollage procesa todas las im√°genes localmente en tu navegador. No subimos tus fotos a nuestros servidores.
about.value_simplicity_desc: Las herramientas poderosas no tienen por qu√© ser complicadas. Dise√±amos nuestra interfaz para que sea intuitiva, para que puedas concentrarte en la creatividad en lugar de aprender a usar la herramienta.
about.value_quality_desc: Professional-grade results without the professional price tag. We strive for excellence in every aspect of our tool.
about.value_accessibility_desc: Free for everyone, everywhere. No hidden fees, no watermarks, no signup required.
about.tech_desc: MeCollage is built using cutting-edge web technologies to ensure a fast, reliable, and secure experience:
about.tech_list_1: Built with modern web technologies (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript)
about.tech_list_2: No server-side photo processing - everything happens in your browser
about.tech_list_4: Works on all devices with a web browser
about.tech_list_5: Regular updates to improve performance and add new features
about.cta_desc: Join thousands of users who have already discovered the joy of easy collage creation with MeCollage.
contact.title: Contact & Support
contact.subtitle: Find help and connect with our community
contact.support_desc: MeCollage is a free, community-supported project. While we don't offer direct email support, you can connect with us through our community channels.
contact.github_desc: Report bugs & request features on our GitHub repository
contact.quick_help_desc: Need immediate assistance? Check out these resources:
contact.about_p1: MeCollage is an open-source, client-side photo collage tool. We believe in privacy, simplicity, and free access to creative tools.
contact.about_p2: Our mission is to provide an easy-to-use, powerful collage maker that respects your privacy and gives you full control over your creations.
faq.a8: No. All photo processing happens locally in your browser. Your photos never leave your device.
faq.a9: We support PNG, JPG, and HEIC formats.
faq.q10: Can I use MeCollage on mobile devices?
faq.a10: Yes, MeCollage works on any device with a web browser, including smartphones and tablets.
faq.a11: Make sure you have uploaded at least 2 photos. Try using a different browser or clearing your browser cache.
faq.q12: Can I use collages created with MeCollage commercially?
faq.a12: Yes! You own the collages you create. Use them however you like.
faq.q13: Will MeCollage add watermarks to my images?
faq.a13: No. MeCollage never adds watermarks to your collages.
faq.q14: How do I change the aspect ratio?
faq.a14: Use the "Aspect Ratio" buttons in the sidebar (1:1, 4:5, 9:16, 3:4, 16:9).
faq.a15: Absolutely. All processing happens locally in your browser. We don't collect or store your personal data.
policy.title: Privacy Policy
policy.privacy.intro.title: 1. Introduction
policy.privacy.intro.text: Welcome to MeCollage. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website, use our services, or interact with us. Please read this Privacy Policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this Privacy Policy, please do not access the site.
policy.privacy.collect.title: 2. Information We Collect
policy.privacy.collect.personal.title: 2.1 Personal Information
policy.privacy.collect.personal.text: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you visit our website, register for an account, or use our services. This information may include:
policy.privacy.collect.personal.list.1: Your name and contact information (if you choose to provide it)
policy.privacy.collect.personal.list.2: Email address (if you subscribe to our newsletter or contact us)
policy.privacy.collect.personal.list.3: User-generated content (such as images you upload to create collages)
policy.privacy.collect.non_personal.text: We may also collect non-personal information automatically when you visit our website. This information may include:
policy.privacy.collect.non_personal.list: Pages viewed and time spent on our website
policy.privacy.use.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
policy.privacy.use.text: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:
policy.privacy.use.list.1: To provide, maintain, and improve our services
policy.privacy.use.list.2: To process and complete your requests
policy.privacy.use.list.3: To personalize your experience on our website
policy.privacy.use.list.4: To communicate with you, including responding to your inquiries
policy.privacy.use.list.5: To analyze usage patterns and improve our website
policy.privacy.use.list.6: To detect, prevent, and address technical issues
policy.privacy.store.title: 4. How We Store Your Information
policy.privacy.store.text1: We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, please note that no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.
policy.privacy.store.text2: For image processing, all images you upload are processed locally in your browser and are not stored on our servers unless explicitly stated otherwise.
policy.privacy.store.retention.title: 2.3 Data Retention
policy.privacy.store.retention.text: Since we do not store your images on our servers, there is no data retention period for user-uploaded content. All image processing occurs locally in your browser. We may retain server logs for up to 30 days for security and analytics purposes.
policy.privacy.sharing.title: 5. Third-Party Sharing
policy.privacy.sharing.text1: We do not share, sell, rent, or trade your personal information with third parties for their commercial purposes. However, we may disclose your information in the following circumstances:
policy.privacy.sharing.list.1: To comply with legal requirements or respond to lawful requests
policy.privacy.sharing.list.2: To protect our rights, property, or safety, and that of our users and the public
policy.privacy.sharing.list.3: With service providers who assist us in operating our website and providing our services
policy.privacy.sharing.text2: Since all image processing happens locally in your browser and we don't require user registration, we do not collect or store any personal information. We do not sell, rent, or trade user data because we don't collect it in the first place.
policy.privacy.rights.title: 6. Your Rights
policy.privacy.rights.text1: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including:
policy.privacy.rights.list.1: The right to access your personal information
policy.privacy.rights.list.2: The right to request correction of inaccurate information
policy.privacy.rights.list.3: The right to request deletion of your personal information
policy.privacy.rights.list.4: The right to opt out of certain uses of your information
policy.privacy.rights.text2_pre_link: To exercise these rights, please visit our
policy.privacy.cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
policy.privacy.cookies.text: We may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website. Cookies are small data files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. You can control cookies through your browser settings.
policy.privacy.changes.title: 8. Changes to This Privacy Policy
policy.privacy.changes.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
policy.privacy.support.title: 9. Support
policy.privacy.support.text_post_link: to report bugs or request features.
policy.terms.title: Terms of Service
policy.terms.intro.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
policy.terms.intro.text: By accessing or using the MeCollage website and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use our website or services.
policy.terms.service.title: 2. Service Description
policy.terms.service.text: MeCollage provides an online platform for creating and editing image collages. Our services include, but are not limited to, collage creation, image editing, and image export. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of our services at any time without notice.
policy.terms.user.title: 3. User Responsibilities
policy.terms.user.text: When using our services, you agree to:
policy.terms.user.list.1: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
policy.terms.user.list.2: Respect the intellectual property rights of others
policy.terms.user.list.3: Not upload or transmit any content that is illegal, harmful, or infringes on the rights of others
policy.terms.user.list.4: Not use our services for any commercial purpose without our prior written consent
policy.terms.user.list.5: Maintain the security of your account (if applicable)
policy.terms.user.list.6: Not attempt to interfere with the proper functioning of our services
policy.terms.user.list.7: Not use any automated means to access our services
policy.terms.ip.title: 4. Intellectual Property
policy.terms.ip.text1: All content and materials on the MeCollage website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, and software, are the property of MeCollage or its licensors and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
policy.terms.ip.text2: You retain ownership of any images you upload to our services. By uploading images, you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, modify, and display your images for the purpose of providing our services to you.
policy.terms.ip.text3: MeCollage is an open-source project. The source code is available for review and contribution. The collages you create using MeCollage belong to you, and you have full rights to use them for any purpose, including commercial use.
policy.terms.privacy.title: 5. Privacy Policy
policy.terms.privacy.text: Your use of our services is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms of Service by reference. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your information.
policy.terms.warranties.title: 6. Disclaimer of Warranties
policy.terms.warranties.text1: Our services are provided "as is" and "as available" without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not warrant that our services will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.
policy.terms.warranties.text2: We make no warranties regarding the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of any content or materials on our website.
policy.terms.liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
policy.terms.liability.text1: In no event shall MeCollage or its directors, officers, employees, or agents be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or in connection with your use of our services, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.
policy.terms.liability.text2: Our total liability to you for all claims arising out of or in connection with these Terms of Service or our services shall not exceed the amount you paid (if any) to use our services.
policy.terms.indemnification.title: 8. Indemnification
policy.terms.indemnification.text: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless MeCollage and its directors, officers, employees, and agents from and against any and all claims, damages, liabilities, costs, and expenses arising out of or in connection with your use of our services, your violation of these Terms of Service, or your violation of the rights of any third party.
policy.terms.termination.title: 9. Termination
policy.terms.termination.text1: We may terminate or suspend your access to our services at any time, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including if you breach these Terms of Service.
policy.terms.termination.text2: Upon termination, your right to use our services will immediately cease.
policy.terms.changes.title: 10. Changes to These Terms
policy.terms.changes.text1: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Terms of Service on this page. You are advised to review these Terms of Service periodically for any changes.
policy.terms.changes.text2: Your continued use of our services after the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of the revised Terms of Service.
policy.terms.law.title: 11. Governing Law
policy.terms.law.text: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of California, United States, without regard to its conflict of law principles.
policy.terms.dispute.title: 12. Dispute Resolution
policy.terms.dispute.text: Any dispute arising out of or in connection with these Terms of Service or our services shall be resolved through amicable negotiation. If negotiation fails, the dispute shall be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of California, United States.
